column4: anu ideas why aptitude wouldnt dl anything from the uni or multi repos?
I really need to get the universe and multi repos enabled, I know I'm askin frequently, but I got a splitting headache, and I cant restart cause I'm making a LiveCD, and I need certain files
Less there's a way to get a .deb file in there from outside the repos
you can get links to deb files at packages.ubuntu.com  ...   Im not sure whats going on with you not getting those other repos, have you checked your sources.list?
yeah, but i dont know of another way to load the program into a liveCD other than via aptitude
there isnt an error, thre just are no packages from uni or multi repos showin up
no, but its wierd, cause they should be enabled
try editing /etc/apt/sources.list   and add the repos there
Ok, I've checked the software sources, and nothin, still not checkin uni and multi, so how would I add em from aptitude
I know, i need to know the apt urls
you just use the existing url for main, and add: universe multiverse restricted
